metadata.name: Achoo #1
metadata.description: Achoo is a generative collection of 10,000 unique NFTs with 62 special edition 1/1s, minted on the Ethereum Blockchain using an innovative community-wide experience called "viral minting". The collection was designed by Tair Almor, a world-renowned ceramic artist and designer, inspired by her personal global pandemic experience of 2020-21. Each Achoo NFT is accompanied by Sneeze tokens, that can be used to continue spreading the project to new holders through the "viral minting" mechanism. For more info about Achoo, visit - https://achoonft.io
